name: Traverse (DelveGames)
description:
TRAVERSE This is the first project of DelveGames and basically, it's a simple cool 2D platformer game, developed using Godot game engine. Game Mission: Collect atleast 25 diamonds and a key to complete a particular level. Game Controls:
  • JUMP     -   UP Arrow key
  • MOVE LEFT    -   LEFT Arrow key
  • MOVE RIGHT    -   RIGHT Arrow key
  • ATTACK    -   LEFT Mouse button \ Num. Keypad '1'.
  • THROW    -    RIGHT Mouse button \ Num. Keypad '0'.

   

         

                 

Big shout out for all free asset providers ........
